my name is not cause im a metal fan. (i barely listen to anything but rap)

back when i was a summerfag i was crazy for the game twisted metal, and i was about to create my first account, thinking of a name?

i said, "i like twisted metal and metal fans are called metaleros"

and i made that name.

i havent changed it cause...i dont know.

maybe its nostalgia or simply what makes me.

like getting another name just isnt me.
